ballerina number 5

Starting at $549.00 (includes free shpping)

The Ballerina series features a poised dancer. Dark and elegant, this black & white series plays with light and shadow, showcasing Wisamun Sitthiket's eye for shape and composition.

All limited edition prints are printed on Ilford Fine Art Smooth 200gsm paper and hand-signed by the artist.

Prints come in two sizes: 13 x 19 inches or 16.5 x 23.4 inches.
